sentences.en: A special CAD system for the centrifugal type ventilator was developed.
sentences.cn: 研制开发了离心通风机的专用计算机辅助设计系统.

sentences.en: Be like inside door work must assemble ventilator, ensure indoor airflow.
sentences.cn: 如室内工作须装配排风扇, 保证室内空气流通.

sentences.en: Harmful gases must be drawn out by centrifugal ventilator.
sentences.cn: 有害气体必须通过离心式通风装置排出.

sentences.en: He was put on a ventilator.
Is a role for different ventilator modes in more difficult weaning?
sentences.cn: 在较困难的脱机中,不同的通气模式有作用 吗 ?

sentences.en: Once the ventilator shaft became blocked, the warehouse quickly filled with fumes.
sentences.cn: 通风管一旦堵塞, 仓库很快就充满了烟雾.

sentences.en: Only the ventilator in the cellar window kept up a cealess rattle.
sentences.cn: 只有地下室窗户上的鼓风机不停地发出呼呼声.

sentences.en: Scientists in Melbourne, Australia, used a ventilator and pump to keep the animal lungs alive and "breathing" while human blood flowed in them.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚墨尔本的科学家们让人的血液流过动物的肺，并用换气扇和打气筒帮助动物的肺存活并“呼吸”。

sentences.en: The room has too few windows. A ventilator must be installed.
sentences.cn: 这间屋子的窗户太少,必须得安个换气扇.

sentences.en: The room installed with stoves should have powerful ventilator.
sentences.cn: 安装灶具的房间必须安装强力换气扇.

sentences.en: The ventilator as it pushed air into his lungs.
sentences.cn: 呼吸器嗖嗖地把空气推进他的肺部.

sentences.en: The ventilator inventor s adventure prevented him from venturing revenge.
sentences.cn: 通风机发明家的奇遇阻止了他冒险复仇.

sentences.en: The ventilator inventor's adventure prevented him from venturing revenge.
sentences.cn: 透风机创造家的奇遇禁止了他冒险复仇.

sentences.en: This paper have introduced the design of synchronous lung ventilator.
sentences.cn: 介绍了一种同步呼吸机的设计.

sentences.en: Under certain circumstances, ventilator autotriggering may occur and produce harmful effects.
sentences.cn: 在某些情况下, 呼吸器自发性驱动可能会发生,并造成病人的伤害.

sentences.en: Ventilator autotriggering can be easily eliminated by decreasing the triggering sensitivity.
sentences.cn: 此现象只要我们调减驱动阈值的敏感度就可以消弭.

words.tran_cn: 发表；使…通风（ventilate的过去分词）
放出；（通过排泄等）减轻压力
使通风；给…装通风设备；宣布

trans.tran_cn: 通风设备，通风机，气窗，负责通风的人
trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment that puts fresh air into a room, building etc
